name: AVSemanticSegmentationMatte.MatteType
desc: A structure that defines the types of segmentation matte images that you can capture along with the primary image.

items.name: static let hair: AVSemanticSegmentationMatte.MatteType
items.desc: A matting image that segments the hair from all people in the visible field of view of an image.

items.name: static let skin: AVSemanticSegmentationMatte.MatteType
items.desc: A matting image that segments the skin from all people in the visible field of view of an image.

items.name: static let teeth: AVSemanticSegmentationMatte.MatteType
items.desc: A matting image that segments the teeth from all people in the visible field of view of an image.

items.name: static let glasses: AVSemanticSegmentationMatte.MatteType
items.desc: A matting image that segments eyeglasses and sunglasses from all people in the visible field of view of an image.

items.name: init(rawValue: String)
items.desc: Creates a matte type with a string.
